title: Chapter 4358 - Chapter 4358: 4357, Hunting The Great Dao Space Beast
body:
Chapter 4358 - Chapter 4358: 4357, Hunting The Great Dao Space Beast

Chapter 4358: 4357, hunting the Great Dao Space Beast

Translator: 549690339

“He escaped again?”

Mo Sha and the others saw the Heaven and Earth Devouring Beast Emperor disappear again when they first came out, and a serious expression appeared on their faces.

It was too difficult to kill.

When they joined hands, their strength was already much stronger than the Heaven and Earth Devouring Beast Emperor.

In addition, the Heaven and Earth Devouring Beast Emperor was still injured.

Under such circumstances, he could still continue to escape. His innate skill was too strong.

The ability of the space beast to escape was too strong!

“I can sense where he is. Chase after him!”

The body of the heaven-swallowing earth-eating beast emperor contained the power of wind and thunder.

Wang Xian could sense his location through the lock of wind and thunder.

However, the distance that the heaven-swallowing earth-eating beast emperor could instantly escape was very far. If they wanted to chase after him, they would need at least a few months.

In this time, that Devourer Beast Emperor, may release some flesh and blood, for escape.

The Beast of the stars, though it has no resurrection treasure.

But they can make living flesh escape.

These flesh, if the original survival of the situation, flesh and blood will soon lose vitality.

But if the body dies, the flesh and blood can be reborn.

Wang Xian wanted to kill him completely and obtain a spot in the starry universe.

“Let’s fight it out!”

“Follow me!”

Wang Xian shouted in a low voice. He waved his arm and forcefully used the Netherdragon transformation!

A black hole was opened.

When the black hole was opened, Wang Xian’s body was riddled with wounds.

The wounds were not light!

However, it was totally worth it to be able to kill the heaven-devouring earth-devouring Beast Emperor!

Buzz

Wang Xian instantly entered the black hole.

Mo Sha and the rest followed closely behind!

In another part of the chaos, when the heaven-swallowing earth-eating beast sensed that the black hole was chasing after it again, its body trembled slightly.

The injuries on its body were very serious. It had used its powerful innate skill many times, causing its injuries to worsen.

Now, the enemies at the back were chasing after it again?

“Roar! Roar! Roar!”

The heaven-devouring Beast Emperor let out an angry roar.

Pieces of flesh and blood on its body flew in all directions. There were a few thousand pieces!

At the same time, it swung its gigantic tail and swept towards the black hole!

Boom! Boom

The moment Wang Xian came out of the black hole, the position of the dragon horn emitted a brilliant light.

A sharp sword that was the combination of light and darkness attacked the heaven-swallowing earth-eating beast emperor’s tail.

The terrifying force landed on its tail and caused a huge wound.

At the same time, its body flew backward for a long distance.

The heaven-swallowing earth-eating beast emperor was not Wang Xian’s match at all.

In a head-on confrontation, Wang Xian had a huge advantage.

“Kill!”

Mo Sha and the rest, who followed closely behind, immediately unleashed powerful attacks that covered the heaven-swallowing earth-eating beast emperor!

“Surround him!”

Wang Xian rushed over. The dragon scales on his body emitted a luster.

The luster condensed into a chain that sealed off the surrounding space!

Wang Xian wanted to leave the heaven-swallowing earth-eating beast emperor here completely, even if he had to pay a tragic price!

“Kill his life force!”

Mo Sha Stared at the heaven-swallowing earth-eating Beast Emperor who was being protected and spread his arms.

“Embrace of the demons, blood!”

He roared loudly and an extremely terrifying phantom image appeared behind him.

The black phantom image attacked the heaven-swallowing earth-eating beast emperor directly.

Beisheng Hundun and the rest immediately unleashed a powerful and terrifying attack.

Frost, fire, lightning.

Gray and terrifying energy.

All kinds of energy raged.

“What terrifying life force. Even under such a siege, he didn’t die.”

Flowing blue and the others were filled with shock.

They felt that if they were attacked by the Dragon King and the others, they could die dozens of times!

However, the heaven-swallowing earth-devouring Beast King continued to roar.

Its aura was overwhelming!

“Roar! Roar!”

The heaven-swallowing earth-devouring beast king passively defended against the attacks of Wang Xian and the rest.

However, the injuries on its body were getting more and more horrifying!

It roared in fear.

It raised its huge head and the phantom image of a huge mouth appeared once again.

When this phantom image appeared, Wang Xian’s expression changed slightly.

“Slash its body with all your might.”

Wang Xian let out a low growl. All the chains around him condensed into a sharp sword and slashed at his body!

Mo Sha and the rest followed up with their attacks and slashed at him together!

The figure of the heaven-devouring earth-eating beast King disappeared slowly once again.

However, this time, it escaped, leaving behind an extremely tragic part of its body.

Its gigantic body was enough to cut off half of Wang Xian’s body!

“Pursue it!”

Wang Xian shouted in a low voice. He kept half of the heaven-devouring earth-eating beast King’s gigantic body and forcefully opened the space of the Netherworld Dragon’s pursuit again!

Forcefully opening the space of pursuit was very damaging to Wang Xian.

Forcefully using it four times was his limit.

After four times, he would die immediately!

After the second time, the injuries on Wang Xian’s body were even more serious!

However, when they came out of the Black Hole, the heaven-devouring Beast Emperor was even more miserable!

Half of his body had been cut off, and the power and attack power of his body had been reduced by more than half!

Now, his destructive power couldn’t even threaten the demonic fiend!

“Kill!”

Wang Xian growled!

“Demonic Abyss, descend!”

The demonic fiend growled, “Dragon King, this move of mine can seal the space. If he wants to escape in an instant, he can’t do it at all!”

The heaven-swallowing earth-eating Beast King was severely injured. The Demonic Fiend’s seal of space could seal it!

“Alright!”

Wang Xian’s eyes lit up and everyone rushed over to attack him.

“Roar! Roar!”

The heaven-swallowing earth-eating Beast King was extremely furious. The body behind its huge mouth suddenly turned into flesh and blood as it flew into its huge mouth.

In the end, it was only left with a huge mouth.

This move made its power almost return to its peak.

“Gan, so fierce? If he can still use his escape ability, I won’t be able to withstand it!”

Mo Sha couldn’t help but Roar!

Wang Xian’s eyes were filled with a solemn expression.

This heaven-swallowing earth-eating beast king was indeed extremely difficult to deal with!

However, what made Wang Xian and the rest relieved was that it didn’t use its escape ability again.

The life force of the heaven-swallowing earth-eating beast King gradually disappeared.

After besieging it for dozens of hours, it was completely destroyed!

“Phew!”

Wang Xian took a deep breath and squeezed out a smile. “It’s finally destroyed. This life force is really terrifying.”

“Master, our strength is so much stronger than his, and we even caused you to suffer such serious injuries.”

Bei Shuang looked at Wang Xian and said with concern.

“It’s indeed difficult to deal with. If I don’t use my injuries to pursue it, it might really escape. However, he released some of his flesh and blood to escape. I need to pursue him.”

Wang Xian spoke!
